The Lumen Protocol

Illuminating trust in profesional relationships.

Get Started

Hard Skills Simplified

Evaluating hard skills is hard. Automated online tests that evaluate job seekers miss the mark by not being able to prove the problem-solving abilities of professionals. Offline approaches, like degrees or diplomas, follow different standards of quality, are hard to verify and are not universal.

With Lumen, experts endorse each other creating together a universal reputation system for hard skills.

Learn More

Incentives will mobilize your network

You might think that to get experts involved evaluating each other is hard. Just the contrary, Lumen has embedded a system of incentives that engages every player by rewarding them for their contribution, combining both social capital and financial incentives.

Thanks to this system of incentives, professionals within each network will be more engaged than ever in your network.

Learn More

Employers will find talent faster

To know the level of skill of professionals will speed up the process of finding talent for employers. Instead of wasting time evaluating unqualified talent, they can now focus their time getting to know qualified professionals.

This system of expert-rating is universal and employers from all across the world can use it reliably.

Get Started

Our mission is to allow professionals and employers trust each other so that they can do business together faster.
